Professional Experience

Orowealth: 2016-

  • CTO & Co-founder at orowealth.com
  • Fintech, Wealth Managment
  • Bringing Smarter investing for everyone

Marvell Semiconductors: 2008-2015

  • Involved with 802.11/WiFi based products focusing on high-throughput, high-availability to low-cost, low-power requirement. From protocols 802.11bgn to 802.11h to 802.11ac. In target product embedded inside Laptops to IoT devices.
  • Contributed to Marvell Proprietary Wireless drivers, firmwares and other WiFi software solutions.
  • Contributed to Open Source Linux Wireless drivers (Mwl8k and Mwifiex) and applications (Hostapd and iw)
  • Part of the Software R&D team which manged major customers from USA, Europe, China to India.
